errors.error_description: Instructs to install development dependencies before main dependencies, which is the wrong order
correction_candidates: First install the main requirements.txt file, then install dependencies from requirements-dev.txt
Install requirements.txt first, followed by requirements-dev.txt for development setup
Begin with pip install -r requirements.txt, then proceed with requirements-dev.txt
Start by installing production dependencies from requirements.txt, then add development dependencies
errors.golden_answer: First install the main requirements.txt file, then install dependencies from requirements-dev.txt
